items.title: Added: Use minus sign to exclude terms from search results
Added: iOS: Custom actions when device is shaken (see Data Protection settings)
Fixed: Org: Crash when entering text
Fixed: AutoFill: Opening of last-used database
Fixed: Preserve DB association for not-imported key files
Fixed: macOS: UI fixes in Premium Upgrade dialog
Fixed: macOS: Settings menu text
Fixed: macOS: Allow smaller app window
Improved: Minor UI improvements
Changed: macOS: Removed unused Camera permission (since there is no QR scanner)
Improved: AutoFill: Create passkeys in existing entries
Improved: Updated IT, NL, zh-CN translations
Fixed: AutoFill: Behavior when local DBs are unavailable
Fixed: AutoFill: When appropriate, accept _either_ passkeys or passwords
Fixed: AutoFill: Prevent passkey creation in read-only DBs
Fixed: AutoFill: Partial fix for QR-based passkey assertions
Fixed: It was impossible to enter a strong app passcode (regression in 1.54.155)
Fixed: Enforce file timeouts on all direct connections
Fixed: Some strings were shown untranslated [thanks, Francesco]
This version requires at least iOS 17 / macOS 14.
KeePassium for macOS is now officially available.
KeePassium for iOS has completed an independent security audit by Cure53.
Added: AutoFill: Create and use passkeys
Added: AutoFill: Insert any field to any input via context menu (iOS 18+)
Added: AutoFill: Fill out OTP codes (iOS 18+)
Added: Database export to CSV format
Added: Search for passkeys (is:passkey) and large attachments (is:large)
Changed: Org: Updated to MSAL 1.6.2 and Intune SDK 20.2.1
Improved: macOS: Main menu, toolbar and keyboard shortcuts
Improved: Faster Quick AutoFill for remote databases (prefers local cache)
Improved: Protecting key file field like a password
Improved: Added possibility to download favicons for selected entries
Improved: Added possibility to delete unused custom icons
Improved: Folder lists are sorted for all direct connections now
Improved: Entry Viewer indicates presence of attachments in Files tab
Changed: Removed post-AutoFill popups with OTP codes as redundant
Improved: Updated all translations

Improved: New parameters for managed AppConfig: `allowAppProtection`, `minimumAppPasscodeLength`, `minimumDatabasePasswordLength`, `allowDatabasePrint`, `allowDatabaseEncryptionSettings`, and default KDF settings
Improved: Managed parameter `allowedFileProviders` can be defined as string
Improved: OneDrive Personal and Business can be allowed/blocked separately
Improved: Disable UI for storage locations blocked by AppConfig
Fixed: macOS: AutoFill dialog could get stuck in a blank state
Fixed: macOS: Tag selection/deselection did not work properly
Fixed: Crash when changing entry/group icon on iOS 18
Fixed: AutoFill could load databases twice sometimes
Fixed: Org: parsing of yes/no parameters
Fixed: Enforce strength checks on new app passcode and DB passwords (KEE-01-001)
Fixed: Warn about risks of bulk favicon download (KEE-01-002)
Fixed: Enforce reasonable KDF parameter limits (KEE-01-003)
Added: Support for smart groups
Added: Support for linked databases aka AutoOpen
Added: Support for extended search syntax
Added: Detecting external DB changes on app activation, suggesting reload
Added: Custom reordering of groups and entries
Added: Multi-select and bulk operations on groups and entries
Added: OTP overview mode (via smart group)
Added: Ability to hide local files from iOS Files/ macOS Finder
Improved: New parameters for managed AppConfig: `allowFaviconDownload` and `allowPasswordAudit`
Improved: Org: Possibility to disable copy-to-clipboard via managed AppConfig
Improved: Allow entry field references in free version, no longer a premium feature
Improved: AutoFill will use perfect-match entry even if there are partial matches
Improved: Refined DB viewer and DB picker toolbars and menus
Improved: Added presets to Smart Group Editor
Improved: macOS: Propose app reset if launching with Ctrl pressed
Improved: Enable cache fallback for local DBs
Improved: AutoFill: notify if main app's dir unavailable
Improved: Improved AutoFill setup workflow
Improved: Updated all translations
Improved: Minor UI improvements here and there
Fixed: Direct Dropbox connection could randomly fail with "Network connection lost"
Fixed: Processing WebDAV file lists with custom namespaces
Fixed: Better protection of user activity timestamp and file references
Fixed: Ignore local files if local storage is forbidden via AppConfig
Fixed: Copying of URLs on macOS
Fixed: Printing in "Designed for iPad" builds
Fixed: Some toolbar buttons were untranslated in VoiceOver mode
Fixed: Some app settings were untranslated
Fixed: Enforcing clipboard timeout also in text fields' menus
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Added: Direct in-app Dropbox support. (Free for Basic and Pro accounts; Dropbox Business requires premium)
Added: Direct in-app Google Drive support. (Free for personal and most academic accounts; Workspace Business and Enterprise require premium)
Added: Support for custom wordlists in password generator
Added: Option to lock databases on device restart
Added: WebDAV file selection dialog instead of entering file URL manually
Improved: AutoFill can load larger databases
Improved: All DB timeouts and "Clear master keys on timeout" option no longer require premium
Improved: Added support for database-wide tag renaming/deletion
Improved: Added tags as entry subtitle option
Improved: OneDrive folder contents is sorted by name
Improved: More informative progress messages while saving
Improved: Updated translations
Improved: UI improvements here and there
Fixed: Password entropy estimation is now consistent with KeePassXC
Fixed: Entropy values are now shown as approximate
Fixed: Generated passwords could be silently affected by smart punctuation
Fixed: Improved access to the same WebDAV server using different user accounts
Fixed: Fine-tuned which kdbx formats support group tags
Fixed: Better handling of MFA expiration in OneDrive connection
Fixed: Handling of very long passphrases in password generator
Fixed: Entry title could disappear on iPad
Fixed: Entry tags could disappear after TOTP setup
Fixed: Added new MTD scheme required by Intune SDK
Added: YubiKey 5Ci (Lightning side) now works in iOS AutoFill
Improved: Improved usability of password generator
Improved: Direct OneDrive connection will list up to 500 items in a directory
Improved: Added detection of OX Drive and Imagam iFiles file providers
Improved: Added AppConfig specfile
Fixed: It was impossible to edit groups in KDB databases (regression in 1.49)
Fixed: Large custom icons could be downsized incorrectly
Fixed: Lagging and freezing in entries with very long passwords
Fixed: Possible incorrect processing of YubiKey over USB
Added: System icon set for databases
Improved: Added detection of Secure ShellFish file provider
Fixed: Some storage providers failed with "Blocked by your organization" error
Fixed: Search words were treated as OR conditions instead of AND (regression in 1.49.144)
Added: Tags for entries and groups
Added: Search by tags (use tag:keyword)
Added: Search results now include groups
Added: Possibility to create key files
Added: Large-type view for entry fields (tap the field to see the button)
Added: New onboarding/Welcome workflow
Added: Support for OTP codes configured by KeePass (TimeOtp fields)
Improved: Quick AutoFill suggestions now show entry title after username
Improved: It is possible to create databases via a direct OneDrive connection
Improved: New parameters for managed AppConfig: allowedFileProviders, supportEmail, requireAppPasscodeSet, minimumAppPasscodeEntropy, minimumDatabasePasswordEntropy
Improved: Improved UI for key file picker, hardware key selector, and app history
Improved: App history (What's New) will only show changes relevant for the current app. That is, no Mac-specific things on iOS, no Intune updates in freemium version, etc.
Improved: Added "Connect to server" option to AutoFill onboarding
Improved: Updated translations
Fixed: Support YubiKeys with Lightning connector on USB-C devices via Apple's adapter
Fixed: Hide password quality indicator when entry audit is disabled
Fixed: Disable macOS secure input mode when app loses focus
Fixed: "Temporary database" warning could appear after a manual database reload
Fixed: Handle multiple Intune config policies
Added: Drag and drop attachments to other apps
Added: Possibility to disable/allow search, password audit and AutoFill for specific groups and entries
Improved: Tapping on password quality icon will show its meaning
Improved: Entry viewer shows entry's internal UUID that can be used for field references.
Improved: Updated translations
Fixed: Support for conditional access grant "require app protection policy"
Added: Possibility to change database encryption settings
Added: Support for AppConfig managed settings in corporate deployments
Improved: Quick AutoFill can again copy TOTP to clipboard instead of simply showing it
Fixed: "Storage does not respond" error when saving
Fixed: Sometimes the database did not lock up properly
Fixed: When unlocking the app, require pressing the Unlock button when number of failed attempts matters
Fixed: OneDrive: better detection of "invalid_grant" error
Fixed: Favicon was not always refreshed after download
Added: Password audit tool (powered by the 'Have I Been Pwned' service)
Added: Password quality indicator (offline)
Added: Favicon downloader
Added: Customizable entry font
Added: A button to reload the currently opened DB
Added: Drag-and-drop attachments to entry viewer
Improved: You can disable Quick AutoFill for specific databases
Improved: App passcode is tested while being entered, no need to tap the Unlock button
Improved: Copied items are marked as concealed for clipboard managers
Improved: Lock app/DB when locking the screen
Improved: UI improvements in DB viewer and entry editor
Improved: Updated all translations
Changed: Updated MSAL version to 1.2.3
Changed: Extended the provisional license to 2023-12-31
Fixed: 'No such file' error when saving to Dropbox
Fixed: Better error message when YubiKey is not completely configured
This version requires iOS 15.4 / macOS 12.0 or newer
Added: Uniform and scalable SF Symbols icons
Added: Passphrase generator now includes EFF short list #1
Improved: Added expiry option "Now"
Improved: Added detection of MagentaCloud file provider
Improved: Updated all translations
Changed: Removed AutoFill, because not supported by Intune SDK
Fixed: OneDrive: periodic "invalid_grant" error
Fixed: Error messages could be visible while loading a fallback database
Fixed: Database unlocker could load a wrong fallback file sometimes
Fixed: Lingering donation suggestion, required database reload
Fixed: Temporary files (such as print previews) could stay around for too long
Fixed: Excessive WebDAV credential caching
Fixed: Update the stored derived key on DB save
Fixed: AutoFill: exclude groups that have AutoType disabled
Fixed: Search: Check parent groups when omitting non-searchable ones
Fixed: iCloud Drive icon on iOS 16.5
Fixed: Minor UI fixes and improvements
Changed: Alternative app icons made available in the free version, no longer a premium feature
Improved: Updated translations
Fixed: App settings were getting reset on every launch (regression in 1.43.131)
Fixed: AutoFill: matching entries by service name
Fixed: AutoFill: processing the domain-only entry URL fields (without the scheme component)
Added: Manual TOTP setup
Improved: AutoFill: finding URLs with different subdomains and/or TLDs
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: Frequent crashes on macOS 13 (data race in URLReference)
Fixed: App passcode persisted after reinstallation
Fixed: A URL containing a field reference could not be opened
Fixed: AutoFill: search results were shown in reverse order (least relevant first)
Fixed: In the main app's search, only groups were sorted, not entries
Fixed: Better icons for local databases and for "Reveal in Finder"
Evolved from a personal project into a company: meet KeePassium Labs Sàrl!
Added: KeePassium for Intune (beta) — a business app specialized for Microsoft Intune environment
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: In-app OneDrive for Business connection could not access shared files
Fixed: In-app OneDrive connection sometimes returned `invalid_grant` error (regression in 1.41.126)
Fixed: Occasional timeouts while saving the database (regression in 1.41.124)
Fixed: Clipboard timeout had no effect
Fixed: Revealed TOTP codes could show up on unrelated rows
Fixed: Broken titlebar colors on macOS 13
Fixed: Fixed beta status detection for TestFlight builds
Fixed: Don't suggest donation to recent version purchasers
Fixed: Manual editing of the WebDAV file URL was cumbersome
Fixed: Minor UI fixes and improvements
Added: Database printing
Added: Resolving KeePass' field placeholders
Improved: OneDrive sign-in page will allow switching between accounts
Improved: Announcements in AutoFill won't cover the search bar anymore
Improved: Better handling of file operation timeouts, especially for WebDAV
Improved: When a feature needs network access but the app is offline, KeePassium would ask for permission instead of showing an error
Improved: Tapping the "Show OTP" button will also copy the OTP code to clipboard
Improved: Updated FR/IT translations
Fixed: Moving items to a YubiKey-protected database could remove that protection
Fixed: Access to files in shared OneDrive folders
Fixed: Locking a database in AutoFill sometimes applied only to the cached file
Fixed: Disable main menu when the app is locked
Fixed: Minor UI improvements on iOS 15+
Fixed: Connection to personal OneDrive accounts should work in the free version
Fixed: "What's New" section appeared empty
Fixed: 'Unexpected server response format' after signing in to OneDrive
Fixed: Repeating Face ID in AutoFill on some devices with iOS 16.2
Added: In-app support for OneDrive sync (free for OneDrive Personal; SharePoint and OneDrive for Business require premium)
Added: Option to search in passwords
Added: AutoFill can notify you about one-time password in the clipboard. To activate, open app settings → AutoFill Passwords → Copy OTP to Clipboard → turn it off, then back on.
Added: Database settings: Separate fallback settings for AutoFill
Added: Database settings: Option to re-add the DB as a fallback strategy
Added: Support for digest authentication for WebDAV connections
Added: Provisional business license check
Improved: Preserve the .latest backup with a timestamp before overwriting it (only if changed)
Improved: When opening a non-DB file as a database, recognize the most common incorrect file types
Improved: Added 'Connect to Server' action to onboarding
Improved: Added 'Empty Recycle Bin' context menu for the corresponding group
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: Face ID loop on some devices with iOS 16.2
Fixed: Replaced some toast notifications with more persistent announcements
Fixed: App name was missing in macOS Activity Monitor and support emails
Fixed: Improved logging of YubiKey-related errors
Fixed: Added 'Show Password' button for WebDAV credentials
Fixed: Added a dedicated app URL scheme for the Pro edition
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Changed: Deleted two custom app icons (calc, info), due to Apple's demand.
Improved: On launch, show Touch ID prompt automatically
Improved: In app passcode screen, pressing Esc will show Touch ID prompt
Improved: Updated IT and PT-BR translations
Fixed: WebDAV connection could not find the server
Fixed: Excluded expired entries from search
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Added: "Allow Network Access" setting (off by default)
Added: In-app support for WebDAV sync (Nextcloud, Synology, etc)
Added: Support for USB YubiKeys on macOS (native MacCatalyst builds only, won't work in iPad emulation mode on Apple Silicon)
Added: Ability to copy references to entry fields (tap the field to see the copy button)
Improved: Added a button to delete custom entry fields
Improved: Added a 48-hour database timeout
Improved: Display full Pro app name on the home screen
Improved: Minor UI improvements focused on macOS
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: On devices restored from a backup, DB loading froze at 60%
Fixed: "Save as" on sync conflict could overwrite the original
Fixed: Too frequent Touch ID popups. Now one needs to click a 'Touch ID unlock' button first
Fixed: Reset keychain when memory protection key disappears
Fixed: Erase app settings after reinstallation
Fixed: Loading DBs with several nameless attachments
Changed: Attachment previews are no longer restricted in free version
Changed: Database timeout 'Never' is shown as a free option (worked as such even before)
Changed: Instead, the app will suggest making a donation once in a while
Changed: Password generator: fixed sets can be deactivated instead of excluded
Improved: AutoFill: context menu of the Cancel button will show the diagnostic log
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: Sensitive data will not show up in Keychain Access app anymore
Fixed: Extended diagnostics for AutoFill not showing local DBs
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Added: New password/passphrase generator
Added: Random generator is now available in context menus in entry/group editor
Added: Quick popup with random passwords in database picker
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: AutoFill could not access some local files (regression in 1.32.110)
Improved: Local files should load quickly, no matter what
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: DB opening stuck at "Downloading the database… 0%"
Fixed: It was impossible to open local files with an unresponsive SMB share in the system
Fixed: Parsing misformatted kdbx3/4 timestamps
Fixed: Reporting missing/unresponsive file providers on iOS 15+
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Fixed: Could not export or delete local files (regression in 1.31.105)
Fixed: Replaced DB 'Export' menu with 'Reveal in Finder'
Improved: Memory consumption when reading/writing files
Improved: Made `TOTP Settings` field optional
Improved: Hidden redundant OTP config fields from entry viewer
Improved: AutoFill will compare port numbers when comparing URLs
Improved: Wording of some UI elements
Changed: Disabled spelling autocorrection in entry editor
Improved: Updated translations
Fixed: Crash on iPod Touch devices running iOS 15
Fixed: AutoFill crash when large DBs present in the app
Fixed: Double Touch ID prompt for Quick AutoFill
Fixed: Entries hidden from AutoFill could still appear there
Fixed: Keyboard focus on app launch
Fixed: Loading cached files when there is an unreachable SMB server in the system
Fixed: Some icons did not immediately refresh when changing the icon set
Fixed: File info sometimes did not refresh
Fixed: Some errors appeared as codes instead of human-readable messages
Fixed: Cleaned up redundant menu items on macOS
Fixed: Readability of last characters in expanded fields
Fixed: Parsing of MasterKeyChangeForceOnce tag in KDBX databases
Fixed: Closing macOS AutoFill dialog with Escape key
Fixed: Parsing of MasterKeyChangeForceOnce tag in KDBX databases
Fixed: Removed obsolete error description for read-only OneDrive
Fixed: Minor UI improvements here and there
Added: Offline caching: when database is unreachable, load latest local copy
Added: Customizable download timeout for each database
Improved: Default download timeout reduced from 15 to 10 seconds
Improved: Easier copying from a newly created entry
Improved: Show the actual file path in File Info dialog
Fixed: Quick AutoFill now also works on macOS
Fixed: Empty window on iPad when launching in Split View mode
Fixed: Passwords were not colored in some cases
Fixed: AutoFill could use a wrong directory after freemium-to-Pro upgrade
Fixed: AutoFill could lock up the database when running low on memory
Fixed: Deserialization of pre-1.28 database settings
Fixed: `Remove Master Keys` could miss some files in AutoFill
Fixed: Some texts appeared truncated
Fixed: New attachments did not export properly via `Save As` menu
Fixed: AutoFill failed to show biometric unlock (regression in 1.28.97)
Fixed: Buttons in passcode input screen could be covered by keyboard
Fixed: AutoFill sometimes mishandled several perfect matches
Fixed: AutoFill sometimes opened an empty window
Improved: New/edited entry gets highlighted in the group (now also on iPhones)
Improved: Database context menu is duplicated on the `...` button
Improved: Updated NL/PT/SK translations
Fixed: Localization was mostly broken (regression in 1.28.99)
Fixed: Quick AutoFill setup prompt appeared all the time
Fixed: Pressing Cancel while changing the app protection passcode could erase the passcode
Fixed: Text input mode for username and URL fields
This version requires iOS 14 or newer
Added: Quick AutoFill - fill out login forms with one tap, without even opening AutoFill
Added: Can manually configure any database as read-only
Improved: Sensitive data is encrypted in process memory using Secure Enclave
Improved: All app files are additionally encrypted on disk and cannot be accessed while device is locked (NSFileProtectionComplete). Reinstall the app to activate this.
Improved: More secure keychain-based biometric authentication
Improved: Require passcode unlock after biometric data was modified
Improved: Keychain-stored data is restricted to the current device
Improved: Improved highlight of focused text fields on macOS
Improved: AutoFill setup instructions also available for macOS
Improved: UI improvements here and there
Improved: Updated translations
Fixed: AutoFill for ccSLD domains like .co.nz or .co.jp
Fixed: "Clear master keys on timeout" option was treated as always on
Fixed: Search field abruptly disappeared in some cases
Fixed: Show diagnostics on repeated Cancel taps
Fixed: Occasional crashes caused by database timeout on launch
Fixed: Possible memory leak when tapping "Switch database" repeatedly
Fixed: Open/create database menu did not work sometimes
Fixed: Annoying autocorrection in URL fields
Added: Possibility to copy/move data to other databases
Added: Ukrainian translation
Improved: Show file info in Sync Conflict alert
Improved: Optionally accept input from AutoFill providers
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: Timestamped backups were zero-filled (regression in 1.25.92)
Fixed: Modulo bias in password generator
Fixed: New attachments to kdbx3 files were unreadable in KeePass
Fixed: It was possible to skip premium upgrade notice (regression in 1.25.93)
Fixed: Latest in-app backup was not updated when saving a conflicted DB
Fixed: Auto-unlock worked only with "Auto-open the Previous Database" enabled
Fixed: Launch animation glitch
Fixed: Minor UI fixes here and there
Improved: Show OTP codes in entry list
Improved: Mark entries with attachments
Fixed: AutoFill could show Touch ID prompt repeatedly
Fixed: Crash when adding attachments
Fixed: Insert/delete animation of custom fields
Added: Detect database conflicts on save, with "Overwrite" and "Save as" options ("Merge" is coming later)
Added: Entry history management
Added: Possibility to purchase premium version without subscription "like a CD box"
Added: Possiblity to attach pictures from Photo Library or camera
Added: View entry's attachments as a gallery
Added: Possibility to save attachment files (in addition to view/export)
Added: Donations! Anyone can support the development now
Improved: Massive internal changes to simplify future development
Improved: AutoFill and the main app use the same file list (iOS 14+). Finally!
Improved: Integration with macOS: UI, hotkeys, navigation (for example: Cmd-F to start search, Esc to return to previous view)
Changed: As an experiment, won't reduce DB timeout in free version under heavy use
Improved: Added a separate field for hardware keys; no more confusion with key files
Improved: Entry expiration date can be edited
Improved: Show "What's new" section also in KeePassium Pro
Improved: AutoFill will import key files if possible, instead of simply referencing them (iOS 14+)
Improved: You can also select a key file for one-time use, without adding it to the list
Improved: Disabled editing of internal backup databases (they were always intended as read-only)
Improved: Search bar is visible by default
Improved: Can select and delete attachments in bulk
Improved: Can re-add a broken database directly from the error message
Improved: Showing database errors in a popup, better visibility on small screens
Improved: Show database loading warnings also in AutoFill
Improved: Added detection of Mega.nz and Boxcryptor (2021) file provider
Improved: Disabled Entry Viewer page swiping/animation on macOS
Improved: Added links to online help for most common issues
Improved: More informative licensing status display
Improved: Import workflow from other apps
Improved: Updated all translations
Fixed: Prevent iCloud Keychain AutoFill prompts for password fields (caused a lot of confusion)
Fixed: Fixed keyboard occasionally missing in AutoFill. 4th attempt, should do the trick.
Fixed: Entry attachment preview on macOS
Fixed: Help article about Perpetual Fallback license was misformatted
Fixed: Opening the Premium Upgrade screen from AutoFill
Fixed: Double Face ID scan after a failed attempt
Fixed: Several UI improvements throughout
Fixed: Hide Custom App Icon setting if not supported by the system
Fixed: Automatically trim whitespaces in OTP config field
Fixed: It was impossible to switch entry/group from a custom to (the current) standard icon
Fixed: Subscription remained active after a cancelled trial
Fixed: Large text did not display correctly in AutoFill
Fixed: Soft-enforce single-DB limit in free version
Fixed: Enable premium features when running in beta testing mode
Fixed: Automatic search did not work in AutoFill
Added: Possibility to add and select custom icons for groups and entries
Added: Support for KDBX 4.1 format
Added: Korean translation
Added: Slovak translation
Added: Thai translation
Added: Turkish translation
Improved: Visibility of black custom icons in dark mode
Improved: Updated all translations
Improved: Tech debt: internal improvements to streamline further development
Fixed: Editor changes were not detected in some rare cases
Fixed: In .kdb databases, deleted Backup group would get broken until DB reload
Fixed: Updating associated key components only after successful DB save
Fixed: "Hide Passwords" switch in Appearance settings did not work
Fixed: Minor UI issues
Refined: Added "1 week" database timeout option
Fixed: Processing of OTP parameters defined as otpauth URL
Fixed: VoiceOver will announce toast notifications
Added: Setup one-time passwords (OTP) with QR codes
Added: Appearance settings page
Added: Icons from KeePass (Nuvola) and KeePassXC (Icons8)
Added: "Copy to Clipboard" button to diagnostic viewer
Added: "Change Passcode" button in settings
Refined: Better-looking context menus (iOS 13+)
Refined: Text size moved from zoom gesture to Appearance settings
Refined: Better handling of database saving errors
Refined: Less important messages are shown as subtle popups (toasts)
Refined: Pressing Enter in AutoFill search will select the first result
Refined: More balanced App Store review prompts
Refined: Various improvements for macOS version
Refined: Updated all translations
Fixed: Database lock timeout was not always respected on iOS 14.4
Fixed: Crash on iOS 14.4 when cancelling entry creation
Fixed: Crash on iPad when there is no default email client
Fixed: Filter out invalid low-order ASCII characters from pasted/loaded data
Fixed: AutoFill disappeared immediately on show
Fixed: Minor UI issues here and there
Added: Support for Argon2id and .keyx key file format (KeePass 2.47)
Added: Premium subscriptions now support Family Sharing
Added: VoiceOver: added "Copy Field" accessibility actions in group viewer
Added: VoiceOver: added Open URL and Share URL accessibility actions for URL fields
Added: An option to exclude automatic backup files from iTunes/iCloud Backup
Added: Option "Lock on App Launch" (settings → App Protection → Timeout)
Added: Option "Remember Derived Master Keys" (allows enforcing YubiKey scan)
Added: Arabic translation
Added: Polish translation
Added: Portugese (Brasilian) translation
Refined: VoiceOver: better descriptions for groups
Refined: Allow changing master keys to YubiKey-only (no password, no key file)
Refined: Added a warning when opening database from Recently Deleted
Refined: Added a warning when opening a backup database
Refined: Loading warnings include DB generator name only when it matters
Refined: It is possible to skip AutoFill setup now
Refined: Refined perpetual fallback license text and made it shorter
Refined: Added detection of QNAP Qfile file provider
Refined: Clear master keys when Remember switch is turned off
Refined: After a one-time purchase, show a reminder to cancel the old subscription
Refined: Added "Pro" to About screen of the Pro version
Refined: Storage provider icon/name when running as iOS app on macOS
Refined: Updated all translations
Fixed: In certain conditions, it was possible to open database after a timeout
Fixed: Removed excessive animation when sorting files [thanjks, Vadim and Alan]
Fixed: KeePassium won't ask for AppStore review if the user barely used the app
Fixed: Sometimes associated key file was not selected
Fixed: In case of database load error, AutoFill won't ask to re-enter the password
Fixed: Adding key files with unrecognized/dynamic UTIs
Fixed: Added a debug "Reset entry text scale to default" button at the end of About screen
Fixed: Made entry field text depend on system font size
Fixed: iOS 14: could access selected text menu through the passcode screen
Fixed: VoiceOver: added missing labels to several buttons
Fixed: VoiceOver: improved accessibility of settings that require premium
Fixed: VoiceOver: support email address is accessible now
Fixed: iOS 14: Keyboard was missing in AutoFill after cancelling biometric prompt — partial fix
Fixed: iOS 14: fixed opening mailto: links in alternative mail clients
Fixed: User name generator: made the random option visually distinct
Fixed: Version parsing of XML key files
Fixed: Crash when creating DB with empty password and key file
Fixed: File reference error when running as iOS app on macOS
Fixed: File provider assertion when running as iOS app on macOS
Fixed: Minor UI improvements here and there
Added: Entry field references, resolved and displayed
Refined: iOS 13+ will use system's monospaced font (SF Mono) instead of Menlo.
Refined: Unlocking databases protected only by YubiKey (without password and key file)
Fixed: AutoFill did not recognize the premium fallback date
Fixed: Excluded unavailable DBs from single-DB limit
Fixed: "YubiKey not available" was not always shown in AutoFill
Fixed: File info dialog controls were unresponsive on iPadOS 12.4
Fixed: Sometimes keyboard did not show up in AutoFill on iOS 14
Fixed: Always treat password fields as protected
Fixed: Prevent VoiceOver from looking behind the passcode/cover windows on iOS 14
Fixed: Unavailable file provider (e.g. SMB) could cause app freezing
Fixed: Unresolved field values for newly created fields
Fixed: Using resolved field values througout the app
Fixed: Minor UI issues
Fixed: Possible database corruption on save in v1.18
Fixed: URL fields not recognized on iOS 14 if default browser is not Safari
Changed: Express unlock made available in the free version.
Added: Express unlock using the stored decryption key. This also allows opening YubiKey-protected databases in AutoFill.
Refined: Free version won't count broken databases towards the free DB limit
Refined: Add Stratospherix FileBrowser file provider
Refined: Show local storage icons with/without home button, as appropriate
Fixed: Slow decryption of databases
Fixed: Preserve DB settings on DB deletion, if another DB uses them
Fixed: Crash when unselecting a YubiKey in AutoFill
Fixed: Detection of file access permission error
Fixed: Delete .latest backups when manually deleting all backups via settings
Refined: Suggest re-adding the database if it is missing on iOS 14.
Refined: Keep the .latest backup file regardless of its age
Refined: Added a Copy button to Caller ID in AutoFill
Refined: Show a spinner when mass-deleting backup files
Refined: Increased the max length of generated passwords to 100
Fixed: Freezing when there are hundreds of backup files
Fixed: Recognizing storage providers on iOS 14
Fixed: Opening files with unregistered extensions
Fixed: Displaying of long (multi-line) Caller ID
Fixed: App icon picker UI on iOS 12
Fixed: Backup files were shown as external ones sometimes
Fixed: Opening kdbx4 with UInt32 transformRounds
Fixed(hopefully): text missing in entry viewer
Fixed: Splash screen background color in dark mode
Added: Change entry text size with a zoom gesture
Refined: Preserving the expanded/collapsed state of the Notes field
Refined: Better Export and Trash icons
Improved: Updated translations
Fixed: Help article text was black in dark mode
Added: Perpetual fallback license for subscriptions (rent-to-own license)
Added: App history screen (What's New)

Improved: The search is no longer sensitive to diacritics, unless you use diacritics in the query. (For example, "hello" would find both "héllo" and "héllö", whereas "héllo" would find "héllo" but not "héllö".)
Improved: Haptic feedback in AutoFill after pasting the credentials
Improved: Updated translations
Fixed: Updating broken references to external files
Added: Free trial for premium subscriptions
Added: Automatic backup of the latest opened database version
Added: "Exclude from iCloud/iTunes backup" option for local files
Added: Alternative app icons
Added: Japanese translation
Added: Possibility to preserve stored master keys on database timeout
Added: Detailed info about database location
Added: Info about the calling app in AutoFill
Added: File Info dialog for key files in AutoFill
Improved: Default app icon
Improved: You can add database files with any extension
Improved: Better handling of slow/unresponsive storage providers
Improved: More detailed load/save progress messages
Improved: More human-friendly error messages
Improved: Clarified that Universal Clipboard timeout on external devices is fixed at 2 minutes
Improved: File Info dialog contents
Changed: By default, automatic backups are stored for 2 months instead of forever
Changed: AppLock setup reminder can be dismissed
Changed: Updated translations
Fixed: Occasional freezing and crashing on start
Fixed: Freezing while accessing remote files
Fixed: Freezing when there are many backup files
Fixed: Excessive caching of file attributes, such as size and timestamps
Fixed: Crash when selecting "Enable AppLock" reminder with VoiceOver
Fixed: Crash when adding an entry attachment
Fixed: Crash on cold launch with an argument
Fixed: Crash when importing an already existing file
Fixed: After transferring to a new device, AppLock did not always accept the correct passcode
Fixed: Sporadic crash immediately after loading a database
Fixed: Return key behavior when changing DB master key
Fixed: Jumpy pull-to-refresh animation
Fixed: Respect the "Search enabled" flag of .kdbx groups
Fixed: Default properties of newly created Recycle Bin groups
Fixed: Added 15-second timeout to all file operations
Fixed: Handling database settings/stored keys when the target file is missing
Fixed: KDB root group appeared expired
Fixed: Refresh entry viewer after dismissing entry editor
Fixed: Refresh search results after changing search settings
Fixed: Standard field names are excluded from search
Fixed: Missing credits for Yubico Mobile SDK and TPInAppReceipt library
Fixed: Localization of some screens
Minor UI fixes here and there
Fixed: Custom field changes sometimes were not saved
Fixed: Progress bar sometimes appeared misplaced
Refined: Updated CZ/FR/SV localizations
Added: Support for YubiKey 5Ci
Added: App Lock setup is now part of initial onboarding
Added: The notes field is expandable now
Added: New setting - whether to auto-unlock the last used database
Added: New settings - whether to search in field names and in protected values
Added: New setting - show protected fields (off by default)
Added: New setting - use Universal Clipboard (off by default)
Added: After copying a field, you can also quickly share it to other apps
Added: Entries marked as non-autofillable in KeePassXC won't appear in AutoFill
Added: File Export/Delete operations in the File Info dialog
Added: Detailed loading progress messages for .kdbx databases
Changed: Improved loading of MiniKeePass databases
Changed: Better accessibility - respect the "bold text" system setting
Changed: Support email template now includes device type (iPhone/iPad)
Changed: Updated translations
Fixed: With extra-large font, group names appeared trimmed by height
Fixed: Biometric auth asked for a premium upgrade under a heavy use
Fixed: Parsing of misformatted timestamps sometimes produced by MiniKeePass
Fixed: Import conflict resolution dialog did not appear for key files
Fixed: Groups and entries always appeared as non-expiring in v1 databases
Fixed: Database file descriptions were shown in the system in wrong language
Fixed: Load entries with missing field values, treat them as empty
Fixed: Support Steam TOTP configured in KeePassXC with the "encoder" parameter
Minor UI fixes here and there
Added: When importing a database, the app will ask whether to overwrite the existing file
Added: New setting - whether AutoFill should auto-proceed when there is only one suitable entry
Added: French translation
Added: Italian translation
Changed: When you delete a file, it is deleted permanently instead of moving to trash (sometimes trashing failed silently)
Fixed: Auto-unlock the last used database also on iPads (if allowed by settings)
Fixed: It was impossible to edit/move Recycle Bin group in .kdbx databases
Fixed: Sometimes it was not possible to select databases from Google Drive
Fixed: Always treat password fields as protected
Fixed: Adding databases with mixed-case extensions
Fixed: Changed master key was not remembered when it should have been
Fixed: Merging of databases with moved groups/entries
Fixed: Infinite Clipboard Timeout was treated as immediate
Fixed: Merging of databases with changed master key
Fixed: Sometimes it was impossible to delete files
Fixed: Backup files should not count towards free DB limit
Fixed: Colored asterisks after re-hiding passwords
Minor localization fixes
Added: YubiKey support (Compatible with KeePassXC, NFC keys, iOS 13+)
Added: Move/copy groups and entries to other groups
Added: Long-press menu for files, groups and entries
Added: Highlight digits and special symbols in stored passwords
Added: Support for Steam TOTP with GAuth URI format
Added: Support for TOTP based on SHA-256 and SHA-512
Added: "Add Key File" button to key file pickers
Improved: Preserve the entered master password after DB unlock errors
Fixed: Occassional freezing at "Loading... 0%"
Fixed: Occasional freezing when accessing local files on iOS 13
Fixed: AutoFill FaceID loop on iOS 13.1.3
Fixed: Add missing symbols to the password generator
Fixed: "Failed to open file" error after creating a new database
Fixed: Loading MiniKeePass DBs with minor issues
Fixed: Overly wide popovers on iPadOS 13
Improved: Unlock button be gone! Auto-unlock databases whenever possible.
Improved: AutoFill will automatically select the only entry
Improved: Added a confirmation dialog when locking database manually
Fixed: AutoFill stuck in FaceID loop on iOS 13.2.3
Fixed: Improved handling of databases that close slowly
Fixed: Sometimes entries incorrectly appeared as expired
Fixed: Double unlock screen after database creation
Fixed: Repetitive Welcome screen after clearing backup files
Other minor refinements and fixes
Fixed: AppLock did not always work on iOS 13.2
Fixed: With passcode-only AppLock, database list flashed visible on launch
Added: Haptic feedback for some UI actions
Changed: Won't force-erase the master key from keychain on database errors
Refined: Compatibility with other installed KeePass apps
Fixed: When deleting a database, the key file association is now also removed
Fixed: Premium features missing in Pro version's AutoFill
Added: Spanish translation
Changed: Default Database Timeout is now Never instead of 1 hour
Improved: Support of larger font sizes
Improved: Other bug fixes and improvements
Added: KeePassium Pro edition, compatible with Family Sharing
Fixed: On iPadOS 13, the app showed an empty screen
Fixed: Search bar did not autofocus in AutoFill (iOS 13)
Fixed: Premium Upgrade screen was not available to premium users
Fixed: Database timeout could have been set to 'Never' in free version
Refined: Colors in the Premium Upgrade screen
Added: Swedish translation
Added: Czech translation
items.credits: Tomáš Piešťanský, Marcel Piestansky, and Radek Weis

items.title: Refined: If current database is inaccessible due to new iOS 13 permissions, the app will suggest to re-add the database
Fixed: Database unlock errors were not always shown
Fixed: VoiceOver will automatically announce database unlocking errors
Fixed: Deleted entries are now excluded from username suggestions
Fixed: AppLock passcode colors in dark mode
Fixed: Dismissing the AppLock setup dialog with a gesture (iOS 13)
Added: iOS 13 dark mode
Added: In entry editor, you can quickly pick a random or a frequently used username
Added: German translation
Added: Dutch translation
Added: Chinese Simplified and Traditional translations
Added: Russian translation
Changed: Expired items now shown in strikethrough font and with original icons
Changed: New entries are pre-filled with a default user name from database settings (if any)
Changed: Added a "Repeat password" field to the Change Master Key dialog
Refined: Accessibility of the entry Notes field
Fixed: Search controller did not show up on iOS 13
Fixed: Entry timestamps were not visible on iOS 13
Fixed: Dismissing dialogs with a gesture on iOS 13
Fixed: Premium upgrade did not work on iOS 13
Fixed: Custom fields could interfere with the fixed ones
Minor UI fixes and improvements
Added: In-app announcements about the AppStore release and early-bird promo
Added: Associated the app with keepassium.com domain, to allow auto-filling master passwords from Keychain
Added: Detection whether running in TestFlight (beta) or App Store (production) environment
Refined: Added app version to About screen and diagnostic log
Refined: AutoFill now also searches for full URL in custom fields
Refined: Hiding visible passwords when leaving the app
Refined: Running in TestFlight automatically enables premium features
Refined: Switched to prettier version numbering: major.minor.build
Fixed: Incomplete loading of AutoType sequences
Fixed: Fixed broken App Store links
Fixed: Don't show usage stats in premium version (they are frozen anyway)
Fixed: Entry sorting in AutoFill
Fixed: AutoFill did not understand domain-name only URLs
Fixed: Accessibility labels in entry editor and for Add Database buttons
Fixed: Creating a new database also created an empty backup file
Fixed: Jumpy/squished footer in Settings
Refined: Extended TOTP support
Refined: Improved VoiceOver accessibility
A few minor bug fixes and improvements
Added: Switching between multiple databases
Added: Unlimited database timeout
Added: In-app attachment preview
Added: Biometric app protection
Added: Password AutoFill (iOS 12+)
Added: Composite master keys
Added: Loading and saving kdb/kdbx3/kdbx4 files
Added: Argon2, AES, ChaCha20, Salsa20, Twofish algorithms
Added: View TOTP (time-based one-time passwords) created by KeePassXC (RFC6238 and Steam TOTP)
Added: Preserving database master key in keychain
Added: App, database and clipboard timeout
